title: PSA: ARAM
body: ARAM should still be randomized from the entire champion pool. It was a game mode created for fun, not for ranked. There is no reason game modes such as this shouldnt utilize every champion in the game, and truly give players a fun experience.

What's a public service announcement?  Could you please put that in a PSA for me so I can understand it?

They need to allow key frags on champs that are unowned. If/when they fix that, make it all random.. Until then, don't increase my dodge rate due to giving me champs I don't own.. I won't play a match if there is no chance of a chest/key frag.. Sorry :/

Yeah... they said they were gonna fix this, what, 4 months now? 5?
At least 8 months, actually, since that's when Hextech Crafting was enabled for ARAM and TT. About 11 months if you're counting from the launch of Crafting.

Shut, when I started playing about 3 years ago, the tribunal was going to be back "soon". Well, 3 years later and nadda... Riot soon and the worlds soon are two completely different things, lol.. I have been pumped to be part of the tribunal for years but no such luck yet.. If my life is ever determined to be over soon, I hope whoever is giving me the prognosis is on Riots timeline :)

At least making it something like one for all where the champion pool is a combine of every player (except in this case it would include the champions the enemy team has as well) would be nice. It would also fix the problem of ARAM-only accounts and actually make the playing field level.

Yea, ARAM accounts are complete anti-fun. The only choice you have once you start getting games full of them is to either make an ARAM account or accept multiple defeats until you are again placed with people less likely to be on ARAM accounts, and then the cycle repeats over and over.

>It was a game mode created for fun, not for ranked.

There's little reason Ranked ARAM couldn't work though.

More importantly, that sentiment doesn't support your point. Many people enjoy their limited champ pools and would have less fun with the full roster.
i get the same 5 champs like 75% of the time. i dont want to play {{champion:266}}  twice a day before the 100 other i own.
And if they did that then what would be the point of playing ARAM when I only like about a third of all their champions. I don't want to deal with the rest of em.
